member.name: T:Egora.Stammportal.CustomAuthorization
member.summary: Holds the information the ReverseProxy adds to the right side request.

member.name: P:Egora.Stammportal.CustomAuthorization.HttpHeaders
member.summary: If the application is a webapplication, this collection holds the http-headers.

member.name: P:Egora.Stammportal.CustomAuthorization.SoapHeaderXmlFragment
member.summary: If the application is a SOAP Service, this XmlFragment holds the Pvp-Soap-Header.

member.name: P:Egora.Stammportal.CustomAuthorization.TimeToLive
member.summary: Time in seconds the Reverse Proxy may cache this information.

member.name: M:Egora.Stammportal.HttpHeader.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance with given name and value.

member.name: P:Egora.Stammportal.HttpHeader.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the header.

member.name: P:Egora.Stammportal.HttpHeader.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the header

member.name: T:Egora.Stammportal.IAuthorizationContract
member.summary: The Reverse Proxy uses this interface. An implementation of this interface needs access to user specific data.

member.name: M:Egora.Stammportal.IAuthorizationContract.GetAuthorization(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Get the authorization for the given application, user and context.
member.param: The root URL of the Application
The UserId of the user initiating the request. Depends on the authentication method.
member.returns: The Authorization for given application and user.
